SEARCH
Package gw.api.web

Class UIMessageList

java.lang.Object
gw.api.web.UIMessageList
public class UIMessageList extends Object
Maintains a list of UIMessage objects, with convenience methods for merging lists together, displaying all the messages in type order (errors first) and so on

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UIMessageList()
    Create new, empty, message list
    UIMessageList(UIMessageList other)
    Create copy of existing message list

    containsMessageOfType(UIMessage.Type type)
    Does this list contain a message with the given message type?
    void
    display()
    Displays all the messages in the list in the web UI as request scoped messages.
    com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<UIMessage>
    getMessages()
    Return the messages in the order they were added
    com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<UIMessage>

  • Constructor Details

    • UIMessageList

      public UIMessageList()
      Create new, empty, message list

    • UIMessageList

      public UIMessageList(UIMessageList other)
      Create copy of existing message list
      Parameters:
      other - non null message list to copy

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add(UIMessage message)
      Add a new message to the message list
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be added, must not be null

    • addList

      public void addList(UIMessageList messageList)
      Add a message list to this message list
      Parameters:
      messageList - the messageList to be added, must not be null and must not be this message list

    • getMessages

      public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<UIMessage> getMessages()
      Return the messages in the order they were added
      Returns:
      immutable copy of the messages

    • getMessagesOrderedByType

      public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<UIMessage> getMessagesOrderedByType()
      Return the messages with the errors first, then the warnings and finally the informational messages. Within each group the messages will appear in the order they were added
      Returns:
      ordered, immutable copy of the messages

    • getOrderedMessages

      public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<UIMessage> getOrderedMessages(Comparator<UIMessage> comparator)
      Return the messages ordered by the given comparator. Uses the standard Java sort, which is stable (that is items that compare equal to the comparator will be left in their original order)
      Parameters:
      comparator - comparator for ordering messages, cannot be null
      Returns:
      ordered, immutable copy of the messages

    • containsMessageOfType

      public boolean containsMessageOfType(UIMessage.Type type)
      Does this list contain a message with the given message type?
      Parameters:
      type - the type to look for
      Returns:
      true if the list contains a message with the given type, false otherwise

    • display

      public void display()
      Displays all the messages in the list in the web UI as request scoped messages. Errors are shown first then warnings then informational messages, as returned by getMessagesOrderedByType()
